item.title: C++ Notes: CUDA
item.author: Author
item.description: A Cuda/C++ starter cheatsheet Harward and software Thread block and grid are logical threads, make programming easy. In hardware, each GPU made of lots of streaming multiprocessor(hardware), which have lots of threads. Special variable kernel: the code (function) run on GPU one kernel, only have one grid, grid have blocks,
